alert.note: Alert for Merrick; Nance (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:48AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Nance and northeastern Merrick Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 648 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Genoa, or 24 miles west of Columbus, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Genoa around 655 AM CDT. Silver Creek around 705 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
